name: Space Clash (Dalvoid)
description:
Space Clash is 2D Shooter game with the theme of conflict in outer space where players must destroy all blackholes and alien bosses

Added feature :

  • 3 Power Up element, and 1 heart element
  • UI element such as minimap, player lives and pause screen objectives
  • Background UI main menu and Instruction for player controller and power up explain 

Created by Drovoid
